Cafe Evansdale is located in Brooke Tower and serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

Monday to Thursday 7:00 AM to 8:00 PM 
Friday 7:00 AM to 6:30 PM
Saturday & Holidays 9:00 AM to 6:30 PM
 Sunday 9:00 AM to 7:30 PM
Summit Cafe is located in Summit Hall and serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
Monday to Friday 7:00 AM to 7:00 PM \nSaturday, Sunday, & Holidays 11:00 AM \n to 6:30 PM
Arnold\'s Diner is located in Arnold Hall and serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
Monday to Friday 7:00 AM to 10:00AM \nand 11:00 AM to 8:00 PM \nSaturday, Sunday, & Holidays CLOSED
Boreman Bistro is located in Boreman Hall and serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
Monday to Friday 11:00 AM to 7:00 PM \nSaturday, Sunday, & Holidays 9:00 AM to \n7:00 PM
The Terrace Room is located in Stalnaker Hall and serves lunch and dinner.

Hatfields is located in the Mountainlair and serves breakfast and lunch.
Monday to Friday 7:15 AM to 10:00 PM \n and 11:00 AM to 2:00 PM \nSaturday, Sunday, & Holidays CLOSED
All bus services seen here are powered by Mountain Line, the Morgantown public transit system. For more information visit busride.org.
